version_description: New location; New weed strains; New characters and items; Aliens and Alien Weed! Faster download and bug fixing

Glorious harvest animation
Magnificent new Vinyl
Inevitable bug fixes

Pesky Alien Weed harvest bug fixed
Glorious harvest animation
Magnificent new Vinyl

Glorious outdoor location - Backyard!
Amazing sun loving weed strains with increased yields - OG Kush and Meao Thai!
A better and more efficient way to save your game progress - Start Screen!
Unexpected A.I. customer - Ella, the Android Girl!
New characters and items
Bug fixes and improvements

Bug fixes and improvements
Glorious outdoor location - Backyard!
Amazing sun loving weed strains with increased yields - OG Kush and Meao Thai!
A better and more efficient way to save your game progress - Start Screen!
Unexpected A.I. customer - Ella, the Android Girl!
New characters and items
- Send gifts to your friends!!

Superpower Mode - an incredibly convenient way to grow
Captain Hemp - a witty superhero character
LOADS of Free Stuff - like and follow Weed Firm on social networks
Facebook invites - a better way to share the game
Invisible Facebook friends bug fix
Other bug fixes and improvements

Long-awaited RV location - a perfect place to make edibles and extracts
Useful items including Rosin Press, Weed Wax Kit and Tincture Still and more
Weed products to cater to all appetites inclusing blunts, space cakes, rosin, wax and more
Eye-catching customizes to speed up human and alien traffic in the RV
Incredible new characters and actions
...and an entirely new way to welcome alien visitors

420 Edition!
Festive 420 decorations and overall holiday spirit
A bluntcentric new character - the fit chick - with an interesting item on sale
Extremely useful new item Weed Vending Machine introducing the ability to make idle profit
Keep Going - new vinyl from Dooby Gang
In by popular demand - new item - Spa Voucher - finally, a way to get Olivia the RV Cop off your back!
Sticker Pack for iMessage
Various bug fixes, improvements, character dialogue expansion and AI

Bug Fixes
Main room expansion. Full court now open!
Obtain and install miners to mine weed crypto coins and unlock and purchase exclusive content.
New strains, new vinyls

New characters Soulja Boy and Possiblephilly.
New vinyls by Soulja Boy and Possiblephilly.
Jukebox - a whole new way to bring good vibes to the Space Bar and boost your progress.
Warp to Next Level - Wanna level up even faster? Now there’s a way.
Alien Safe - Protect your Alien Weed stash from space pirates.
Customize your Space Bar and speed up alien customer traffic.
New levels, characters, bug fixes and improvements.

- Improved Energy system in Space Bar
- Updated XP accumulation algorithm in Space Bar
- Better animations
- Protagonist dialogue expanded
- Minor improvements and bugfixes

New extraterrestrial location - Space Bar is here!
8 New Levels
Alien devices - Goo Vacuumizer, Centrifuge Crusher, Gravity Shaker, Jello Freezer and Alien Grinder
Alien edibles & extracts - Rastanaut Goo, Big Bang Cocktail, Stardust, Jello Shots and Alien Blunts
Clients - Intergalactic Smuggler, Xolpo, Meryaclaws
Antagonists to challenge your skills - Editor 42, Blob & Mermy
Items - Spaceship and Plasma Gun
High items - Space Cows and Discoball
Spaceship customize - Hypervape Engine
Spacebar Pack and a myriad of minor improvements and bugfixes.
